overview: This graduation film is a clever and meditative piece that both caresses and attacks the senses. Director Tasaka Naoko said: 'I'm pursuing something undistinguishable, with no name or with no boundaries, like something implied in a loose connection of the words in poetry. It's not an unknown thing. It's something which I already know but I donâ€˜t know how to describe. I search in my experience and recollection trying to rebuild something similar with the fragments of my memory.'
title: Light Escapes Through the Intervals
